messages.subject: More SA updates
messages.msgSnippet: Here is the next batch of updates to the Samurai Archives, with yet more to follow: Added The Hidden Relevance of Japanese Historical Influences to the
messages.messageBody:
Here is the next batch of updates to the Samurai Archives, with yet
more to follow:

Added 'The Hidden Relevance of Japanese Historical Influences' to
the 'featured articles' section:
http://www.samurai-archives.com/hrj.html

Added the Hojo clan to the 'Clan Timelines' section:
http://www.samurai-archives.com/clantime.html

Added the bio of Hojo Ujitsuna to the 'Famous Samurai' section:
http://www.samurai-archives.com/ujitsuna.html

Updated the bio of Adachi Yasumori in the 'Famous Samurai' section:
http://www.samurai-archives.com/yasumori.html
